snippet: Despite robust economic data, the central bank left its key interest rate at 0.5 percent and continued to hold 375 billion pounds in government bonds.
abstract: Bank of England leaves benchmark interest rate unchanged at 0.5 percent, and leaves stimulus program unchanged; decision comes despite robust economic data.
lead_paragraph: Despite robust economic data, the central bank left its key interest rate at 0.5 percent and continued to hold 375 billion pounds in government bonds.

headline.main: Bank of England Keeps Interest Rates Unchanged
headline.print_headline: Britain Holds Rates Steady as Economy Strengthens
